name: Clay
description: Metropolis & $CLAY: The Future of Digital Economy and Ownership Metropolis is a next-generation digital world where gaming, commerce, and community converge. At its core is $CLAY, the utility token powering the ecosystem—fueling quests, digital commerce, real-world asset (RWA) access, and property ownership. Unlike traditional gaming or commerce platforms, Metropolis is powered by $CLAY, a token that drives quests, commerce, real-world asset (RWA) access, and property ownership. Players and creators don’t just participate—they own and shape the economy.
